title: Nerf Mundo please
body:
Cleaver Slow retarded amount enough for him to hit you again (hitbox screwy as well so zig zagging doesn't help)

Ult every 20 seconds seriously...

massachism basically does a sated jax amount of dmg (WHY)

Who's idea was it to let him get so out of hand please just nerf him to the ground

replies.body:
As a {{champion:36}}  player no he doesn't need a nerf you just got to learn how to counter him tbh..
You just cant rush him is where the problem lies...
as a mundo player your opinion is invalid and bias, and im proven correct by your following statement

I once faced a mundo top as Kennen and I could not farm and he tower dived me while ending up recovering more health than he started with before the dive. If I can't do anything at all it's justified.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Koalifier,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fgwo2XA8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-08T23:18:48.664+0000)
>
> We just did: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-524-notes
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/A9QqOmBl-hecarims-e-devestating-charge

Could you please have a look at this and tell me what you think?

Cheers.
Hmmmmmmmmmmm, I believe we pushed out a fix for this in patch 5.24.  Please poke me again if you see it after the patch.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Koalifier,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fgwo2XA8,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-12-08T23:58:16.795+0000)
>
> Hmmmmmmmmmmm, I believe we pushed out a fix for this in patch 5.24.  Please poke me again if you see it after the patch.

Hi i feel it is still not right. you can see it does tiny damage but seems like there should be much more with the MS i had.

https://gyazo.com/45f6bd61d95166d790e7a3116a0cd3b6
100 ad + like 30 on e. about 58% resist on tower. So the damage is now around 53 - 30 = 23 damage
